FlowRecordElement.name: FlowRecordElement
FlowRecordElement.description: Represents a single element within a flow version. This object is available in API version 58.0 and later.

ElementName.description: The API name of the flow element.

FlowRecordVersionId.description: The ID of the flow version the flow element is part of.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time that the flow element was last used.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time that the flow element was last viewed.

Name.description: The label of the flow element.
